SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
JavaFX Application class
BaseScene
A Base Scene used in the game.
BlockClickedListener
The Block Clicked listener is used to handle the event when a block in a GameBoard is clicked.
ChallengeScene
The Single Player challenge scene.
ChangeAimListener
ChangeAimListener interface to handle when the aim is changed using the mouse of the keyboard.
CommunicationsListener
The Communications Listener is used for listening to messages received by the communicator.
Communicator
Uses web sockets to talk to a web socket server and relays communication to attached listeners YOU DO NOT NEED TO WORRY ABOUT THIS CLASS! Leave it be :-)
Game
The Game class handles the main logic, state and properties of the TetrECS game.
GameBlock
The Visual User Interface component representing a single block in the grid.
GameBlockCoordinate
Represents a row and column representation of a block in the grid.
GameBoard
A GameBoard is a visual component to represent the visual GameBoard.
GameLoopListener
GameLoopListener interface to detect when a new game loop happens
GameOverListener
GameOverListener interface
GamePane
The Game Pane is a special pane which will scale anything inside it to the screen and maintain the aspect ratio.
GamePiece
Instances of GamePiece Represents the model of a specific Game Piece with its block makeup.
GameWindow
The GameWindow is the single window for the game where everything takes place.
Grid
The Grid is a model which holds the state of a game board.
InstructionsScene
Creates a new scene to show the user how to play the game
Launcher
This Launcher class is used to allow the game to be built into a shaded jar file which then loads JavaFX.
LineClearedListener
LineClearedListener interface
MenuScene
The main menu of the game.
Multimedia
Responsible for playing music and audio effects in the game
NextPieceListener
The Next Piece listener is used to handle the event when a new piece is provided by the game it can update the PieceBoard with that piece.
PieceBoard
PieceBoard is a visual component to represent the grid of each piece.
RightClickedListener
The Right-Clicked listener is used to handle the event when a piece needs to be rotated in the game.
ScoresList
ScoresList is a custom UI component which extends VBox to create an animated list of the online and local scores.
ScoresScene
ScoreScene class extends the BaseScene to create a scene to show the local scores and the online scores after the game is over.
